snippet.title: Crony Corp is NOW available to Wishlist on Steam!
snippet.description:
🚨 Crony Corp is coming soon—so hit that Steam Wishlist button today! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3195450/Crony_Corp/ 

Are you ready to take over the corporate world from your living room? 💼 Crony Corp isn’t just another strategy game—it’s a full-blown corporate domination simulator, where crafting, upgrading, and a little sabotage are all part of the daily grind. 📈

What can you expect in Crony Corp?
✔️ Build and upgrade your factories like a boss.
✔️ Control the live economy by managing market prices and PvP battles with rival CEOs.
✔️ Sabotage your competition like a true corporate mastermind—because in business, all’s fair in love and sabotage. 💥
✔️ Plan your empire’s growth with strategic factory placements, optimize supply chains, and make sure you’re the one dominating the market.

And the best part? You can do all of this while lounging in your PJs, because, in Crony Corp, even the CEO can work remotely. (Just ask our devs!)

Follow us on Twitter (Oh it's X now, right?), Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok, 

#SteamWishlist #MMO #StrategyGames #CorporateDomination #Sabotage #GameDev #IndieGame #GamersUnite
